long_description: This Marin Bayview Trail 24 in. boys' bike boasts an agile, responsive frame with a plush fork so he can tackle trails confidently as he develops his skills. 6061 aluminum frame is double-butted to strengthen joints; it's also lightweight, so young arms and legs can move it easily. SR Suntour M-3020 suspension fork provides 50mm of travel to soften the ride, helping the rider maintain control of the bike; springs are optimized for smaller riders. Truvativ triple crankset and 7-speed cassette make climbing easy thanks to the 21 gear combinations. Shimano EZ-FIRE Plus trigger shifters provide intuitive shifting action; linear-pull hand brakes offer controlled deceleration. Kenda tires deliver a stable ride and are suitable for both on- and off-road travel. Specs on the Marin Bayview Trail 24 in. boys' bike are subject to change.
